moves.1... e5 2. Bb2 Bxb4 3. Bxe5 Nf6 4. a3 Be: Blk has good hold on the center
moves.10. Bb2 b5 11. a4 b4 12. d4 c4: Blk has gain lot of space.
Due to the 3 W pieces on the Q wing, I thought about mating attack but was unable to find good variations
moves.19. Bd3 Qd7: Plan is to win the game by play on the Q side
moves.24. f3 Nd7 25. e4 Nb6 26. Ra2 a4 27. Bf4:
Resignation.
After 13...c3 I thought i will win quickly and easily. Probably I played bad mid game.
On the other hand W resisted very well and prolonged the game, waiting for a blunder from blk.
